title: The Math Book
description: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems.

title: The Invisible Man
description: Why did the invisible man turn down the job offer? He couldn't see himself doing it.

title: The Scarecrow
description: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!

title: The Computer
description: Why was the computer cold? It left its Windows open.

title: The Light Bulb
description: How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None, that's a hardware problem.
